content.title: Uses
content.description: Leaves are used for preparing mehandi. Possesses the secondary metabolites like flavonoids, tannins and phenolic compounds, alkaloids, terpenoids, quinones, coumarins, xanthones and fatty acids. Plant has analgesic, hypoglycaemic, hepatoprotective, immunostimulant, anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, antimicrobial, antifungal, antiviral, antiparasitic, antitrypanosomal, antidermatophytic, antioxidant, antifertility, tuberculostatic & anticancer properties.
